details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:2024 - 8.2 Logical structure - 8.2.5.14 Footnotes and Endnotes (FENote) - Note
details.description: The Note standard structure type shall not be present in conforming documents unless role mapped to a structure element in the PDF 2.0 namespace

rule.description: The Note standard structure type shall not be present in conforming documents unless role mapped to a structure element in the PDF 2.0 namespace
